resources.string:
Please enable "Device administrator" in order to perform a screen lock.
 Please do the application in uninstall the following method.
 1.Launch a AutoPhoneUnlock
 2.Tap the menu button (the right edge of the top of the screen)
 3.Tap the "Uninstall AutoPhoneUnlock" and follow the instructions on the screen
Do you want to control service?

Do you want to continue with the uninstallation after disabling the lock screen? If you cancel the uninstallation of the application in the next screen, please enable the screen lock in the application settings.
Do you want to start controlã€€service?
Do you want to stop control service
Control service is stopped, so cannot control device
Control service is stopped, so cannot control device
Backup file is already exists, override backup file?
Backup file has been created in the %s. Do you want to restore?
Screen theme has been changed, but it does not take effect unless you restart the application. Do you want to application restart.
Bluetooth LE device is can not scan because location is disabled. Please enable location information in the Android setting.
Application that displays the text file was not found.
